entities.name: great hall
entities.description: The Great Hall is the main hall of Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry where students have meals.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student at Hogwarts who has his nose stamped by Professor Snape.

entities.name: victorius
entities.description: The score of 161 is mentioned in the context of Quidditch match.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is a student at Hogwarts who mimics something to do with Harry's nose.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a friend of Harry and a student at Hogwarts.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a prefect at Hogwarts who helps the first-years.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is a teacher at Hogwarts who stamps Harry's nose.

relationships.description: Malfoy mimics something to do with Harry's nose.
Ron is a friend of Harry.
Hermione helps the first-years as their prefect.
